Question
========

De kansvariabele B is binomiaal verdeeld met n = 20 en p = 0.3. Dan geldt P(B = 3 ||| n =20; p = 0.3) is 

Answerlist
----------
* 0.11
* 0.21
* 0.24

Solution
========

The correct answer is  0.11
